data.description: Implements base64* and base32* in C
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module implements modern version of MIME::Base64 functions and
    is slightly faster than MIME::Base64. Also it implements
    MIME::Base32 functions and is >100x faster than MIME::Base32.

    base16 and others are comming
